meanings.definition: Following one after another in order
meanings.sent1: The consecutive days of sunshine made everyone happy.
meanings.sent2: The students lined up in consecutive order for the school assembly.
meanings.sent3: The consecutive slices of pizza disappeared quickly at the party.
meanings.sent4: Her consecutive wins in the game made her unstoppable.
meanings.sent5: The consecutive rain showers turned the streets into rivers.

meanings.definition: The quality of being consecutive or following in order
meanings.sent1: The consecutiveness of the numbers in the sequence helped solve the math problem.
meanings.sent2: The consecutiveness of events in the story kept the readers engaged.
meanings.sent3: The consecutiveness of the jokes in the comedy show had everyone laughing.
meanings.sent4: The consecutiveness of the waves crashing on the shore was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The consecutiveness of the train schedule ensured timely arrivals and departures.
